text: Veronika Pavlovna Pepelyaeva (; born 3 August 2001) is a Russian tennis player. Pepelyaeva has a career-high WTA doubles ranking of 483, achieved on 31 December 2018. Pepelyaeva made her main-draw debut on WTA Tour at the 2019 Baltic Open, where she received a wild card for the doubles competition partnering Anastasia Tikhonova. ==ITF finals== ===Doubles (1–2)=== {|class=wikitable style="font-size:85%; width:15%;" !
